message: This offer is based on a fair split considering the decreasing value of money with each round.

I believe in fairness. This equal division ensures both of us receive an equivalent amount, despite the diminishing value of money.

Considering the significant decrease in the value of money, I propose this division to ensure a fair share for both of us. I hope we can come to an agreement.
